author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Italtile Says ‍HY System-Wide Turnover Up At 4.25 Bln Rand
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Italtile Ltd:
* ‍HY SYSTEM-WIDE TURNOVER R4.25 BILLION VS R3.50 BILLION​ YR AGO
* ‍HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE 48,6 CENTS, UP 5 PERCENT​
* ‍HY TRADING PROFIT AT R716 MILLION​, UP 21 PERCENT * ‍LIKE-ON-LIKE RETAIL STORE TURNOVER FOR HY DECREASED BY 3,9%​
* ‍HY DIVIDENDS PER SHARE AT 17,0 CENTS, UP 6 PERCENT​ * ‍MANAGEMENT ANTICIPATES THAT SECOND HALF OF YEAR WILL BE STRONGER THAN SECOND HALF OF PRIOR YEAR​
* PLANS TO OPEN AT LEAST ANOTHER 10 STORES IN NEXT SIX MONTHS, WHICH WILL BRING TOTAL NUMBER OF STORES OPENED DURING FULL YEAR TO 22​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
